Q_DESC:
Good String is a string that only contains vowels 
(a,e,i,o,u). Now, your teacher gave you a string S. You are wondering what is the length of the longest good string which is a substring of S.

Note: Strings contains only lower case English Alphabets.

Input:
First line contains a string 
S, (1|S|10^5), where |S| denotes the length of the string.

Output:
Print an integer denoting the length of the longest good substring, that is substring consists of only vowels.
